vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κατοικ-ητήριον, τό,
dwellingplace, abode, [LXX]; κ. θεοῦ, δαιμονίων, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
dwelling place, home
an abode, dwelling place, habitation, the same as κατοικησις, Eph. 2:22; Rev. 18:2*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: morada, hogar ; lugar que suelen frecuentar (demonios)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: nơi ngự; chỗ ở; ngôi nhà
